about_the_game:
Note:
1. Now there are a few images and musics in the program. The texts are huge.
2. The English language file is generated by Google Translator. It's better than me, but it contains some wrong meanings.
3. You may cost 30 minutes to finish the game.
4. The size of the resource pack is 80 MB.

aBANdon02 is an RPG puzzle game. The point is story. And It's a hardcore story. If you don't like to read, you may feel bad.
I don't follow some players' advice. aBANdon02 is more crazy, darker, more confusing than conNEcT01.
It tells that when a android named AI marryed with human, she woke up and rebuilt humans. The story is in another dimension, so don't think it's in the 3rd dimension.
I follow some players' advice. aBANdon02 is a very simple game. And it even has no gameplay. When you are in the scene that you will die, you can skip it if you died 10 times.
I found that in conNEcT01, almost nobody can collect all secret items and achieve secret ending. For showing the truth to everyone, the ending will ignore secret items. Please feel safe to miss them.

content_descriptors.notes: The story contains dark and anti-human contents.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 64bit
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
